transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji sir, bol rahi hu IndiaMART se. Good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon, boliye na.
Customer: Haanji, aap sir ek na concern raise yaha pe karaya, main Rishabh ki manager bol rahi hu. Aapki jo company Green Way Global hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, toh aapko yaad hoga jab aapne ye renewal process karaya tha, us time bhi concern raise kara tha price ke regarding, tabhi maine aapse baat ki thi. Toh abhi same as aapne concern raise kara hai yaha pe. Aapke jo previous account manager the, Dileepan ji, unke paas hi aap apni service bol rahe hain forward karwa dijiye aur woh aapke jo bhi saari cheeze hain pehle se jaante hain. Toh aapke liye easy hoga unse saari cheeze discuss karna, hai na? Aisa hi aapne kuch dala.
Customer: [inaudible] hai, hamare kya hai na, Dileepan nahi hai. Madurai mein koi bhi aapki banda rahega toh aapko thoda sa convenient hai. Karan kya hai na, hamara toh ek warehouse hamara ek Madurai mein ek open kar raha hu, distribution channel ke liye. Isliye hamara idhar body se bhi udhar thoda sa woh aadmi log ko udhar transfer kar raha hu Madurai mein. Isliye udhar ka local mein support milega toh thoda sa easy bhi rahega.
Executive: Achha, but sir usme na problem yahi hai ki aapka jo account hai, main na head office se run hota hai. Jitne bhi clients agar jaise payment service koi bhi use karte hain na, aapki export jo service hai woh payment mein aati hai. Toh is wajah se na aapka yaha pe head office mein run ho raha hai aur woh bhi kaafi time se run ho raha hai. Matlab aisa nahi hai ki woh recently aapka move hua hai. Kaafi time se aapka jaise payment service aapki export ki chalu hui hai tab se yaha head office mein hi run ho raha hai. Aur jitne bhi clients hai woh saare head office se hi run kara rahe hain saari services aur yaha se hi hoti hai run. Toh usi reason ki wajah se hum aapka move toh nahi kar payenge. But agar aapko koi service point of view se problem hai, aisa kuch hai toh aap mera number save kar lijiye. Main accordingly aapko guide kar sakti hu. Rishabh ji toh aapko guide karte hi hain. Toh uske alawa main bhi aapko detail mein guide kar dungi agar kuch problem hai aapko ya aapki team ko service part pe.
Customer: Achha, achha, samajh gaya, samajh gaya.
Executive: Baaki maine na Dileepan ji se baat ki thi kisi concern ke liye toh aapke saath I think discussion bhi hua hoga Dileepan ji ka, saath call aaya hoga aapke paas.
Customer: Hmm, woh toh ek service ke liye call kiya tha unko. Matlab woh abhi hamara phone nahi checkega toh bhi kuch na kuch doubt rahega toh woh place karta hai.
Executive: Achha, toh aapko doubt, main aapko ek easy way batati hu. Doubt agar aapko jaise kuch bhi rehta hai toh aap I think unko call ya WhatsApp karke pehle batate hoge. First time jab karte hoge toh call ya WhatsApp hi karte honge aap I think.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Hai na? Toh aap same as mujhe woh jo concern aapko jo bhi lag raha hai aap mujhe WhatsApp ya call pe kuch bhej dijiyega. Main apne end se woh cheez sahi kar dungi agar mere end se hi honi hogi aur agar aapki taraf se mujhe help chahiye hogi toh main aapko call karke woh correction turant as it is karwa dungi.
Customer: Bilkul, bilkul. Nahi, abhi humko kya hai na, matlab humko package thoda upgrade karna padega. Iske baare mein thoda sa humko ideas chahiye.
Executive: Haan, haan. Main bata deti hu aapko usi ke liye. Jaise agar aapka export ke liye aap ye cheez soch rahe ho ya phir domestic ke liye plan kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Domestic ke liye humko weekly 44 buyleads aa raha hai na. Woh weekly buyleads humko badhna chahiye. Humko ek 9200 buyleads humko chahiye weekly.
Executive: Theek hai. 92 weekly chahiye.
Customer: Haan, haan. Matlab uske hisab se chahiye. Isliye matlab uska kaun sa package available hai woh toh hum log upgrade karne ke liye soch raha hu. Iske service ke humko chahiye.
Executive: Achha, main aapko. Main aapko bhijwa deti hu. Waise aapko ek agar discussion mere saath aapka jo hua tha export ka jab aapne renew karaya tha aapko yaad hoga toh aapne mujhse pricing maangi thi, yaad hai aapko? Ki kitne discount mein aap karwa dijiye.
Customer: Woh din ho gaya aapne.
Executive: Haan, sir koi baat nahi. Toh maine aapko na us time discount karke toh diya hi tha, saath mein maine ek offer bhi add on karke de diya tha jo ki aapka koi bhi aap next agar koi service loge toh usme aapko seedhe seedhe hum ₹12,980 ka discount flat de denge.
Customer: Achha, aisa mil raha hai.
Executive: Toh, toh aapka jo, aap agar woh cashback, maine cashback ke naam se aapke usme offer mein add karaya tha jo aapne proposal approve kara tha export wala, usme us according maine usko us naam se daal diya tha aur woh aapka accordingly aapke invoice section mein bhi add ho chuka hai woh amount ₹12,980. Theek hai? Toh ab aapko jo plan karna hai main woh plan aapko bata deti hu. Aapko ye do categories ke liye plan karna hai ya ek category ke liye plan karna hai yaani ki green cardamom, whole spices aapki bahut categories hai toh aap bataiye aapko minimum kis according isko plan karna hai?
Customer: Woh sirf domestic ke liye abhi karna padega humko.
Executive: Haan, toh ye pan India all cities ke liye aapko chahiye ya kuch specific cities ke liye chahiye chahiye aapko?
Customer: Achha, nahi main kya bol raha hu, aap thoda sa WhatsApp kar sakta hai ye plan ke hisab se?
Executive: Haan, main aapko sir bhej de rahi hu aur woh hamara na leader ka hi package hai, uska leader different leader naam hai. Aapko detailing main aapko WhatsApp aur mail dono pe share kar de rahi hu aur usme aapko nine, usme jitni overall leads hai na woh aapko usme main mention karke bhi de dungi. Do category ke according aur one category. Haanji.
Customer: Theek hai, main dekh ke aapko revert kar deta hu. Theek hai na?
Executive: Haan, aur ek, ek last cheez sir puch lijiye, aapka ye jo usme concern hai, jo aapne dala hai isko main close kar du? Kyunki Dileepan ji se bhi meri baat ho gayi, ho gayi hai. Agar kuch issues honge toh hum aapko guide kar denge aur unse bhi main baat karke aapka corrections karwa dungi.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, close kar lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai, aapko, aap mera na number save kar lijiyega. Main bhi aapko WhatsApp pe hyphen bhi kar de rahi hu aage further issues ke liye. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, okay.
Executive: Haanji, haanji, Aashish ji. Okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to move account to Madurai location.

- Wants to upgrade the subscription package.

- Wants 90-100 weekly buyleads.



Resolution:

- Explained account is run from head office.

- Offered personal guidance for service-related issues.

- Agreed to send package details on WhatsApp and mail.

- Offered to close the concern raised by customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review the package details.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, account management, upgrade, discount
